title: Demon
description: DemonI am the President of the Steel Skulls MC. Dominant, Lost and Broken....until I run into the woman that haunts my dreams; the woman that got away.AmayaA trip to the cemetery on Halloween night, wasn't where I wanted to be. My friends said it would be fun, but seeing the restless spirits, has me running. What I didn't expect was running into someone from the past and here's the kicker...he's the asshole, I don't want to fall in love with.
author: April Lynn Baker
